name: Get Out In Time
description:
This is my input to the Mini Beansjam 7 in the year 2021. This is a simple game the player has to find it's way out of the labyrinth. The time maybe short so try to collect the hidden clocks to get to the goal!

Developers: René Papenfuß

Assets Used:

  • POLYGON Starter Pack - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty

Tools Used:

  • Unity 2020.3
  • Blender
  • Affinity Photo
  • mixamo.com
